short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop along with your favorite influencers in Ulta and Sephora.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See what influencers say and do with the products you browse on Ulta and Sephora.

Bontty allows you to scan through video mentions to cosmetic products from your favorite influencers as you browse Ulta and Sephora. It aims to help you quickly form an impression about a product by seeing how it looks on skin and listening to influencersâ€™ opinions.

How to use Bontty?

1. Install the Bontty Chrome extension. 
2. After installation, you will be prompted to select your favorite influencers. You can change your settings anytime by accessing the extension's options.
3. Browse products on www.ulta.com or www.sephora.com as you normally would.
4. At the top right corner of Chrome, you will see the Bontty icon colored if we found mentions for the browsed product.
5. Scroll down to 'Mentions by Influencers', select an influencer and enjoy!

Help us improve! Give your feedback at hello@bontty.com
